channel.title: basset Blog
channel.description: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest basset news and events.

item.title: Version release 1.0.0-beta
item.description: I started working on Basset a few months ago, I originally wanted to render jest snapshots to see the differences between common components. As I started out playing around with different libraries I saw there wasn't a out of the box solution for catching differences, at least one that would fit my needs.
